ncmeta 0.2.5

File info

Source: R/nc_inq_file.R
nc_inq.Rd

Get information about a NetCDF data source, may be a file path, or a RNetCDF file handle, or an OpenDAP/Thredds server address.

nc_inq(x, ...)

# S3 method for NetCDF
nc_inq(x, ...)

# S3 method for character
nc_inq(x, ...)

Arguments

x

filename or handle
...

ignored

Examples

# \donttest{
if (FALSE) {
 f <- raadfiles:::cmip5_files()$fullname[1]
 nc_inq(f)
 nc_var(f, 0)
 nc_dim(f, 0)
 }
# }
f <- system.file("extdata", "S2008001.L3m_DAY_CHL_chlor_a_9km.nc", package = "ncmeta")
nc_inq(f)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 5
#>   ndims nvars ngatts unlimdimid filename                                        
#>   <int> <int>  <int>      <int> <chr>                                           
#> 1     4     4     65         NA C:/Users/michae_sum/AppData/Local/Temp/RtmpIJvJ~
nc_var(f, 0)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 15
#>      id name  type  ndims natts chunksizes cache_bytes cache_slots
#>   <int> <chr> <chr> <int> <int>      <dbl>       <dbl>       <dbl>
#> 1     0 chlo~ NC_F~     2    12         64     4194304        1009
#> # ... with 7 more variables: cache_preemption <dbl>, deflate <int>,
#> #   shuffle <lgl>, big_endian <lgl>, fletcher32 <lgl>, szip_options <int>,
#> #   szip_bits <int>
nc_dim(f, 0)
#> # A tibble: 1 x 4
#>      id name  length unlim
#>   <int> <chr>  <dbl> <lgl>
#> 1     0 lat     2160 FALSE

nc_vars(f)
#> # A tibble: 4 x 5
#>      id name    type     ndims natts
#>   <int> <chr>   <chr>    <int> <int>
#> 1     0 chlor_a NC_FLOAT     2    12
#> 2     1 lat     NC_FLOAT     1     5
#> 3     2 lon     NC_FLOAT     1     5
#> 4     3 palette NC_UBYTE     2     0
nc_dims(f)
#> # A tibble: 4 x 4
#>      id name          length unlim
#>   <int> <chr>          <dbl> <lgl>
#> 1     0 lat             2160 FALSE
#> 2     1 lon             4320 FALSE
#> 3     2 rgb                3 FALSE
#> 4     3 eightbitcolor    256 FALSE
# \donttest{
if (FALSE) {
## thredds (see rerddap)
u <- "https://upwell.pfeg.noaa.gov/erddap/tabledap/FRDCPSTrawlLHHaulCatch"
nc_inq(u)
# A tibble: 1 x 5
#ndims nvars ngatts unlimdimid
#<dbl> <dbl>  <dbl>      <lgl>
#  1     2    18     37         NA
# ... with 1 more variables: filename <chr>
}# }
